Comment 4: 
I have thought about this issue before and Russ' patching suggestion is the same
conclusion I arrived at. That's what this issue should be about now.

With regard to the blog, I am in the process of replacing blog.golang.org with something
written in Go. All the articles will stored in the same place as those in /doc/articles/
(whether it's there or somewhere else, I haven't decided yet).
